means: （民选的）市长( mayor的名词复数 )
（英格兰、威尔士和北爱尔兰由议员选举产生的）镇长

sentence.Network_en: Mayors want local companies to behave ethically.

sentence.Network_cn: 市长们戴着象征职位的项链.

sentence.Network_cn: 两个城镇的市长向总统请愿,要求停止把他们的青年派往越南.

next year 11 british cities will have the chance to replace the existing local-government structure , in which leaders are chosen from the ranks of councillors , with directly elected mayors .明年十一个英国城市有机会改变现有的领导人由议员中选出的地方政府架构，代之以用直接选举市长的方式。

entry.def: The mayor of a town or city is the person who has been elected to represent it for a fixed period of time or, in some places, to run its government.
